name: Ayane
title: The Agile Blade
subtitle: A swift assassin who dances through battle with deadly grace
lore: A master of the blade arts, Ayane moves like a deadly butterfly across the battlefield. Her unique ability to manipulate teleportation and control space makes her an unpredictable opponent, while her mastery of blade techniques allows her to strike with lethal precision.

passive.name: Sting
passive.description: Ayane's autoattack charges based on the distance she has traveled. When it reaches 100, her next autoattack deals bonus [55/130/260/350/650] magic damage. Teleports, dashes, and running all count towards increasing the stack.

Q.name: Teleport Blade
Q.description: Ayane summons a blade from the sky for [3s]. If it hits an enemy, it deals [40/98/230/340/480] damage and slows them by [55%] for [2s]. The ability can be reactivated to teleport Ayane to the blade's location.

W.name: Butterfly Trail
W.description: Ayane summons butterflies in a designated direction, granting her allies [35%] bonus movement speed and herself [65%] bonus movement speed while they are on the path.

E.name: Backdash
E.description: Ayane dashes backward and throws a blade forward. If the blade hits an enemy, Ayane can dash to them within [1.35s]. The blade deals [80/144/311/437/512] damage on hit.

R.name: Flying Execution
R.description: Ayane dashes in the designated direction. If she passes through enemies, she deals damage equal to [22% of the enemy's missing HP]. If this ability kills an enemy, it resets and costs only [25%] mana for the next [10s].

1.name: Magic Shield
1.description: After using an ability, Ayane gains [4%] stackable magic shield for [5s].

1.name: Blade Follow-up
1.description: After using Teleport Blade, Ayane's next autoattack within [1s] deals an additional [20%] AD as physical damage.

1.name: Auto Shield
1.description: Ayane gains a [1] autoattack shield every [20s/16s/13s/10s/9s]. Can't stack.

5.name: Protective Trail
5.description: Butterfly Trail also grants Ayane and her allies a shield that absorbs up to [110/210/310/410/700] damage for [3s].

5.name: Giant Slayer
5.description: Your passive deals [15%] more damage if the target has more MaxHP than you.

5.name: Survival Instinct
5.description: When Ayane's HP is below [40%], she gains [17%] damage reduction for [3s]. This effect can only occur once every [45s].

10.name: Escape Artist
10.description: After using Flying Execution and not killing an enemy, Ayane gains an item, which she can activate any time until she gets the ability back. Activating this item gives a temporary charge for her R ability for [5s] which won't deal damage.

10.name: Execution Power
10.description: Using Flying Execution gives Ayane bonus [13%] AD for [3s].

15.name: Stunning Blade
15.description: Ayane's Q ability empowered: Now it stuns hit enemies for [1.2s] instead of slowing them.

15.name: Empowering Trail
15.description: Ayane's W ability is empowered: Now it gives her and her allies [5%] bonus damage for their next attack.

15.name: Double Dash
15.description: Ayane's E ability is empowered: Now it has 2 charges, but it no longer deals damage.

20.name: Swift Killer
20.description: After Ayane kills an enemy champion, her cooldowns are reduced by [5s].

20.name: Silencing Strike
20.description: Ayane's E ability now silences the hit enemy for [0.8s].

20.name: Multi-Charge
20.description: Ayane gains an additional charge for all her basic abilities, but their cooldowns are up by [8s].

20.name: Quick Charge
20.description: Item: Upon activation, Ayane can instantly recharge her passive [20s cooldown].

strengths: Team utility with movement speed buffs
